description: You can keep your balance while traversing narrow or treacherous surfaces
You can evaluate the monetary value of an object
You know how to tell a lie
You are skilled scaling vertical surfaces, from smooth city walls to rocky cliffs
You are skilled in the creation of a specific group of items, such as armor or weapons
You can use this skill to persuade others to agree with your arguments, to resolve differences, and to gather valuable information or rumors from people.
You are skilled at disarming traps and opening locks.
You are skilled at changing your appearance.
You training allows you to slip out of bonds and escape from grapples.
You are skilled at flying, through either the use of wings or magic, and can perform daring or complex maneuvers while airborne.
You are trained at working with animals, and can teach them tricks, get them to follow your simples commands, or even domesticate them.
